name: Dungeon Time (itch) (Kraesh Rronnack)
description:
A short dungeon escape for submission in the GameDev.tv Community Jam.

This was my first game jam, and I have only been studying game development for 4 or 5 months! I jumped in with a friend and my brother, who are equally inexperienced with gamedev. Watch my Devlog of the experience HERE.
